name: book-appointment
title: Book Appointment
description: A compact, interactive appointment booking component with calendar and 3D time slot selection. Features month navigation with fade animations, booked date indicators (strikethrough, non-selectable), infinite scrolling time slots from 9 AM to 5 PM with 15-minute intervals, unique 3D perspective scroll effects creating a circular strip appearance, and real-time selection display. Fully responsive with mobile-optimized sizing. Perfect for scheduling and booking interfaces.
